ygData.subject: Re: Couple Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... there s an NPC outside the weapon shop * i saw him through a window* who told me a large story about the kilij, actually quite interesting.  To get the
ygData.messageBody:
---- The quest starts in Kelethin - The weapons shop by the druid guild,
there's an NPC outside the weapon shop * i saw him through a window* who
told me a large story about the kilij, actually quite interesting. To get
the Kilij you have to bring him the plans and 3 bars of enchanted gold,
that's all i know at this time.

> Yes i do know where the plans come from, can you please send more info to
> the list as to where the quest starts from please, at any rate the plans
> come off a SG in so ro, hes not named however he is distinguished by being
> much lower level than a sg normally is, mid to hight twenties instead of
> thirties. Now that i have helped you please help me and tell me where the
> quest starts.
>
>
> > Get paid to surf the web! Free!
> http://www.alladvantage.com/go.asp?refid=bvf753
>
